=*Report of Meeting #11*=

*Meeting Date: 18.10.2012*

*Meeting Duration: 45 minutes*

*Meeting Location: ETA A4*

*Participants: Suzan Üsküdarlı, Hakan Demir, Samet Serpil, Beste Başçiftçi, Sinan Narmanlı, Sarper Sertoğlu, Mustafa Ertürk*

*Activities:*

  # Former location mechanism of the website was based on selecting towns and districts in the search section. It is decided that it would be better to use a GPS based location mechanism, that would give importance to the distance between the locations, rather than searching in a specific district that could result in insufficient search results. 
  # Instead of having a single rating for the service provider, it is decided that each user will have two kinds of rating: One rating for the services that he/she provided and the other one for the services that he received.
  # It is decided that the verification of the users is not necessary in our project.
  # Use Case Scenarios will be updated in order to see the necessities of the system requirements and development phase in detail.
